H0.text: Mandibles are a characteristic shared by all members of the Arthropoda and Chordata phyla.

H1.text: Simple eyes are a characteristic shared by all members of the Arthropoda and Chordata phyla.

H2.text: Jointed limbs are a characteristic shared by all members of Arthropoda and Chordata phyla.

H3.text: One pair of wings is a characteristic shared by all members of the Arthropoda and Chordata phyla.

A4.text: Arthropods are invertebrates with segmented bodies and jointed limbs.
